devdoc.author: Noah Zinsmeister
devdoc.details: Supports both prefixed and un-prefixed signatures.

params._address: The address that may or may not have signed the passed messageHash.
params.messageHash: The messageHash that may or may not have been signed.
params.r: The r component of the signature.
params.s: The s component of the signature.
params.v: The v component of the signature.

isSigned(address,bytes32,uint8,bytes32,b.return: true if the signature can be verified, false otherwise.

devdoc.title: Provides helper functions to determine the validity of passed signatures.

isSigned(address,bytes32,uint8,bytes32,b.notice: Determines whether the passed signature of `messageHash` was made by the private key of `_address`.
